## Author Checklist

### Quality
- [ ] PR title follows `type(scope): description`
- [ ] Lint, typecheck, and build pass locally
- [ ] Added targeted test for the fixed path

### Security and Data Safety
- [ ] Auth/tenant checks unchanged or improved
- [ ] No new secrets or sensitive logs introduced
- [ ] Security review report added for high-risk bugfixes (`docs/06-quality/security-review-report-template.md`)

### Docs and Governance
- [ ] Updated docs if behavior changed
- [ ] Decision log updated for significant trade-offs
